main.name: Mohammad Shiblur Rahaman Shuvo
main.bio: My name is Shuvo, I am a Full Stack developer. Before i started my job i have been working on my own projects that you will find in my github.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: Some of my Skills that I have developed

work.title: Full-stack engineer
work.description: Here i am working as a full-stack developer. I am using React js, Node js, Next js, Mysql and Mongodb. We have so many features in our app that is build by our team. Here i have a great team so we are very much flexible in work.

testimonials.text: I have been learning programming from 2018. I am a self taught developer. I have learned Html, Css, Php, Javascript, NodeJs, React, Firebase, Next js, Mysql, Mongodb. I have done some projects. I also have some private project that i have done for the client. So I did not add all my projects on my portfolio

Now I want to develop my skills on programming more and more by working with new technologies in different projects. I am very much confident in this sector and I hope i will be able to reach my goal.
If you need more information about me, contact me via email or in linked-in. Thank you!
